summary: During the Vietnam War, Colonel Hambleton's aircraft is shot down over enemy territory and a frantic rescue operation ensues.
cast: Gene Hackman|Danny Glover|Jerry Reed|David Marshall Grant|Clayton Rohner|Erich Anderson|Joe Dorsey|Michael Ng|Theodore Chan Woei-Shyong|Don Ruffin|Scott Howell|Michael Raden|Timothy Fitzgerald|Stuart B. Hagen|Jeffrey Baxter|Alan King|Bonny Yong|Willie Lai|Martin Yong|Jim Aman|Freddie Chin|Dennis Chong|Liow Hui Chun|Fung Yun Khiong|Henry Lee|Ming-Yang Li|Jeffrey Liew|Fredolin Leong|Benedict Lojingkau|Walter Lojingkau|Johnny Michael|Clarence Mojikon|Wilod Nuin|Harold Sinpang|Paul Yong|Conidon Wong|Craig Huston|Robert 'Bobby Z' Zajonc
title: Bat 21
